# [Interview #151: COT Signing Report - David Funke, Entry #6](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=151#6)

#### Question

If Rand is the reincarnation of Lews Therin, why does he have no contact with personalities before Lews Therin?

#### Robert Jordan

Read and find out.
